Html:
Hi,
I import template xlsx
    $objReader = PHPExcel_IOFactory::createReader("Excel2007");
    $objPHPExcel = $objReader->load("tempate.xlsx");
and when a save (not change only read and save)
    $objWriter = PHPExcel_IOFactory::createWriter($objPHPExcel, 'Excel2007');
    $objWriter->save('xlsx/file' . $time . '.xlsx');
and in some cell background is white (no background), though in orginal file background is OK.
Screen
http://mobisave.pl/problem.jpg


i'm used PhpExcel 1.8.0 and php 5.4.7
